description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(482).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,966,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[482], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(21 + 22 x + 461 x^2 + 483 x^3 + 461 x^4 - 22 x^5 + 21 x^6 - x^7)/(1 - 966 x^4 + x^8), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 12 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms and second link corrected by _Colin Barker_, Dec 28 2013
